text: aur (yaad karo) jab hamane kaha ki is bastee[1] mein pravesh karo, phir isamen se jahaan se chaaho, manamaanee khao aur usake dvaar mein sajda karate (sir jhukaaye) hue pravesh karo aur kshama-kshama kahate jao, ham tumhaare paapon ko kshama kar denge tatha sukarmiyon ko adhik pradaan karenge
